name: dart-tournament-software
description: WAMO Dart Tournament Management System - Complete solution for Raspberry Pi deployment

scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:frontend: npm run lint:scoring && npm run lint:display && npm run lint:mobile
scripts.format: npm run format:backend && npm run format:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm run install:frontends && npm run install:backend
scripts.install:frontends: cd scoring-terminal && npm install && cd ../display-terminal && npm install && cd ../mobile-app && npm install
scripts.install:backend: cd backend && python -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.build:frontends: cd scoring-terminal && npm run build && cd ../display-terminal && npm run build && cd ../mobile-app && npm run build

author: WAMO Dart Tournament System
